name: Just Match 3 - Get 10 Numbers Puzzle
description:
The most beautiful number puzzle game for you.
It's easy to play for everyone, however it could also drive genius crazy.
Explore this little game's deep challenge and practice your mind beyond imagination.
Find the same number in colorful tiles and combine them to grow up to get 10.

HOW TO PLAY :

Tap the tiles to swap 2 numbers to get 3 same numbers in a row or a column and get bigger number. Eg: 1 -> 2, 2 -> 3, ...
If you get 10, numbers nearby 10 will disappear, more space, more scores.
Sound easy?
Try to get 10 and BOOM!

Features:
● Easy to play, hard to master
● Simple and colorful design
● Share high score on facebook, twitter, ...
● Tablets supported
● 4 Play mode, 3 board size

JUST MATCH 3 - JUST GET 10! JUST ENJOY IT!
